title: The ice/fire icons are not working...
body:
I wasted 250 rp :( and now it doesn't work. When i watch bjergsen when he has a fire icon it works on NA. 
On Eune it doesn't

replies.body:
The Finishers/Emotes only lasted until December 17th. They are limited time bonuses only available for that All-Stars event.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/pick-your-side-fire-vs-ice
This is correct. You can still equip the icon, but you won't have the finishers. Generally, finishers are temporary.
